title: Smart Data models - MetroNetwork schema"
description: description of a generic entity. You have to change this.

type.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Example of definition of a numerical attribute

topology.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Text'. Current state of network topology.

totalLenght.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. Metro network model length in kilometers. Units:'kilometers'

transmissionType.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Text'. Current state of network topology.

field3XXX.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Example of definition of a date-time attribute

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

Node.description: Relationship. Reference to the other entity
